```{r setup}
# Load dashboardr (includes dplyr, highcharter as dependencies)
library(dashboardr)

# Global chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  error = FALSE,
  fig.width = 12,
  fig.height = 8,
  dpi = 300
)

# Conditional-visibility helpers (fallback for older package versions)
if (!exists('show_when_open', mode = 'function')) {
  show_when_open  <- function(j) cat(paste0('<div class="viz-show-when" data-show-when=\'', j, '\'>\n'))
  show_when_close <- function()  cat('</div>\n')
}

# Load data
data <- readRDS('dataset_large_27216obs_2.rds')

# Data summary
cat('Dataset loaded:', nrow(data), 'rows,', ncol(data), 'columns\n')

```

### Row

#### Income distribution by region

```{r boxplot-income-region}
# Income distribution by region
result <- viz_boxplot(
  data = data,
  title = "Income distribution by region",
  color_palette = c("#4E79A7", "#59A14F", "#F28E2B", "#E15759"),
  weight_var = NULL,
  x_var = "region",
  y_var = "income",
  backend = "echarts4r"
)

result <- dashboardr:::.embed_cross_tab(result)

result
```
